languages.text: "Активные ищущие люди радуются, когда им позволяют раскрыть весь свой потенциал на службе Богу-Императору".

traits.locale_text: "Не сомневался в этом. Активные ищущие люди лишь радуются, когда им позволяют раскрыть весь свой потенциал на службе Богу-Императору".

languages.text: "Driven, inquisitive people rejoice when they are given the chance to reach their full potential in service to the God-Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Активные ищущие люди радуются, когда им позволяют раскрыть весь свой потенциал на службе Богу-Императору".

traits.locale_text: "Driven, inquisitive people rejoice when they are given the chance to reach their full potential in service to the God-Emperor."
"Driven, inquisitive people rejoice when they are given the chance to reach their full potential in service to the God-Emperor."
"Driven, inquisitive people rejoice when they are given the chance to reach their full potential in service to the God-Emperor."
"Driven, inquisitive people rejoice when they are given the chance to reach their full potential in service to the God-Emperor."

languages.text: “对那些充满干劲与求知欲望的人而言，当他们有机会发挥自己的全部潜力为神皇服务时，他们确实会欣喜若狂。”
languages.original_text: "Driven, inquisitive people rejoice when they are given the chance to reach their full potential in service to the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “对那些充满干劲与求知欲望的人而言，当他们有机会发挥自己的全部潜力为神皇服务时，他们确实会欣喜若狂。”

languages.text: «La gente motivada y curiosa se alegra al recibir la oportunidad de alcanzar su máximo potencial para el Dios Emperador».
languages.original_text: "Driven, inquisitive people rejoice when they are given the chance to reach their full potential in service to the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «La gente motivada y curiosa se alegra al recibir la oportunidad de alcanzar su máximo potencial para el Dios Emperador».

languages.text: 「意欲的で好奇心旺盛な人々は、神帝陛下への奉仕のために自分の潜在能力を最大限に発揮するチャンスを与えられれば喜ぶだろう」
languages.original_text: "Driven, inquisitive people rejoice when they are given the chance to reach their full potential in service to the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「意欲的で好奇心旺盛な人々は、神帝陛下への奉仕のために自分の潜在能力を最大限に発揮するチャンスを与えられれば喜ぶだろう」

languages.text: « Quand on sait faire preuve d'une grande détermination et que l'on porte sur l'univers un regard inquisiteur, on ne peut que se réjouir d'avoir la chance de mettre tout son potentiel au service de l'Empereur-Dieu. »
languages.original_text: "Driven, inquisitive people rejoice when they are given the chance to reach their full potential in service to the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « Quand on sait faire preuve d'une grande détermination et que l'on porte sur l'univers un regard inquisiteur, on ne peut que se réjouir d'avoir la chance de mettre tout son potentiel au service de l'Empereur-Dieu. »

languages.text: "Motivierte, wissbegierige Menschen empfinden Freude, wenn sie die Chance erhalten, ihr volles Potenzial im Dienste des Gottimperators zu entfalten."
languages.original_text: "Driven, inquisitive people rejoice when they are given the chance to reach their full potential in service to the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Motivierte, wissbegierige Menschen empfinden Freude, wenn sie die Chance erhalten, ihr volles Potenzial im Dienste des Gottimperators zu entfalten."

languages.text: "Azimli ve araştırmacı insanlar, Tanrı İmparator'a hizmetlerinde tam potansiyellerine erişebilme şansı karşısında neşeyle dolar."
languages.original_text: "Driven, inquisitive people rejoice when they are given the chance to reach their full potential in service to the God-Emperor."
